title: Managing Delegates
description: Gmail API guide on managing delegates - mailbox sharing within Google Workspace organizations

requirements.organization_scope: Delegates must be in same Google Workspace organization

research_questions_addressed: GM-MA-003: Partial - Confirms API calls scoped to userId, app must track context
unanswered_questions: GM-ID-005: Do delegator and delegate see same messageId for shared messages?
Do label IDs behave differently in delegated access?
Are history IDs shared between delegator and delegate?
